headlines.description: — Ryan Leonard had two goals and Alex Ovechkin also scored, helping the Washington Capitals beat the Edmonton Oilers 7-4 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leonard and Ovechkin help the Capitals beat the Oilers 7-4
